/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on handling cases of fraud, including
types of cases to refer to OIG
procedure for handling cases in which a fraudulent act might have occurred
referring a case of fraud to OIG
, and
cases of fraud involving Central Office (CO) or regional office (RO) employees
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section A  - Fraud and Laboratory Analysis of Evidence
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section A
